title: Feature request: Move a tab to a new window
author: cheesecracker
body_snippet:
Currently, we could only have a **single** window to show all the connections.  And every connection in a tab.  It would be nice if we could open a connection (ie a tab) to a new window.  Esp because I have two monitors and therefore it's very convenient to open two RDP windows in different monitor.

This behaviour is very common in browsers.  Take Firefox as an example:
1. Open two web pages in two tabs
2. Right-click on any tab to show the context menu
3. Choose "Move Tab > Move to New Wi...
